palath disthrik sangam ha krida samaja niyojanaya karamin chandaya dimata niyojithayan 187k sudusukam laba sitiyaha.chandaya pawathi shalawata athuluwu sama ayekugema jangama durakathana aarakshaka ansha bharayata gath athara sadharana chandayak nidahase pawathwimata awashya heyin ema piyawara gath bawa krida adhyaksha jenaral ranjani jayakodi mahathmiya pawasuwaya.krida sangamwala lekamwarunge illim matha piyasena gamage (dakuna), sarath eekanayaka (madhyama), wijith wijayamuni soyisa (uuwa), barti pe්ramalal (uthuru mada), dilan perera (uuwa), pe්ramalal jayasekara (rathnapura), rohana disanayaka (mathale), si. bi. rathnayaka (nuwaraeliya), duminda disanayaka (anuradhapuraya) yana mathi amathiwarun palath disthrik sangam niyojanaya karamin nilawaranayata ekwa sitiyaha..
